BIG UPDATE:
- BRAND NEW WIDGETS for iOS 14 with theme customization.
- Add support for light & dark mode.
- You can now arrange main screen's sections.
- More charts: UV Index, Wind, Dew Point & Humidity.
- New data source for Australia, France & Canada.
- Detailed information for Air quality.
- Support multiple layers on Radar.
- Bug Fixes And Performance Improvements.
